body:

issue.title: docs: Add Docker as dependency in CONTRIBUTING.md
issue.body:
Docker is also a required dev dependency to make the tests pass.

Also see #379

body: I'm not sure that #381 fixes this - it's not about having docker, it's about having credentials that can push to that dockerhub org...
No #381 was not a fix for this. Just marked it as related. This issue here is still open and unsolved :/

issue.title: fix: docker tests should not depend on the main docker registry
issue.body:
Makes it not necessary to be logged in the in the docker registry for
the tests to work by using a local registry.

Fixes #379

## Types of changes

<!--- What types of changes does your code introduce? Put an `x` in all the boxes that apply: -->

- [x] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [x] I have read the **CONTRIBUTING** document.
- [x] `make ci` passes on my machine.
- [ ] My change requires a change to the documentation.
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly.
- [ ] I have added tests to cover my changes.

body: just opened a PR that may fix this: #395
This issue has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
